stories.text:
I started using Gumroad just to start my digital journey of selling products. Started with few small projects but that didn't go well.

But then i understood the need and started creating 100+ Mesh gradient pack and it gained over 500+ downloads and 35$+ in revenue. I know its not too big but its a good start.

Here is the link if you wanna grab them for free : https://beingmani.gumroad.com/l/Meshgradient
stories.title: 6 Weeks of Hustling, My free product earned over $35 with 500 Downloads
China finalising security deal with Solomon Islands to base warships in Pacific

stories.text:
Today I missed my online exam because I was 12hours late. Being European and engineer I was used to 24hours notation. “12:00 AM” was interpreted as 12:00 noon in my head. In retrospect i’m disappointed Pearsonvue (in this case) does not write these times in universal format or even better, attach an ics file upon schedule confirmation.

My question to you is: did you run into this kind of mistakes also? How do we solve this more universally?
stories.title: Ask HN: What does 12:00 AM mean?
